name: discord-dialer
description: A dialer utilizing MicroSIP and Discord.JS

scripts.dist-test: grunt build-dist && cross-env NODE_ENV="prod" && node index.js
scripts.prod: grunt build-dist && cross-env NODE_ENV="prod" && pm2 start index.js
scripts.shard: grunt build-dist && cross-env NODE_ENV="prod" && pm2 start shards.js
scripts.dev: grunt build-dist && cross-env NODE_ENV="dev" && grunt dev

author: DamienVesper
